org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

Interface ResourceFacade


  • public interface ResourceFacade
    Uniform client facade API to perform common operations on top of REST to serve a resources of various REST APIs through single interface.
    Author:
    Aurel Medvegy

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        <T> SingleRequest<T> newInstance(@Nonnull
                               Class<T> resource)
        Create a new in memory resource instance of requested type.

        Note: Based on the concrete implementation of the resource it may result in a remote call in order to get a more specific resource instance -> Either created locally with 'new' operator or based on the implementation a remote call may be executed to get a 'new' instance initialized with default values and given parameters if any.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SingleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to create
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return new resource instance for given type
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found (remote call)

      • newInstance

        <T> SingleRequest<T> newInstance(@Nonnull
                               Class<T> resource,
                               @Nullable
                               Map<String,Object> parameters,
                               @Nullable
                               Locale locale)
        Create a new in memory resource instance of requested type with optional parameters and locale.
        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to create
        parameters - the optional resource parameters
        locale - the language the client has configured to prefer in results if applicable
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return new resource instance for given type
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found (remote call)

      • media

        <T> UploadMediaRequestProvider<T> media(@Nonnull
                                      T resource)
        Upload a media and related metadata represented by given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance of concrete type to insert or update
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return newly inserted or updated instance of given resource
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found

      • media

        <T> DownloadMediaRequestProvider media(@Nonnull
                                     Class<T> resource)
        Download a media for given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to download as a media
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return concrete resource instance for given type and identifier,
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found

      • get

        <T> SingleRequest<T> get(@Nonnull
                       Class<T> resource,
                       @Nonnull
                       Identifier identifier)
        Retrieve a resource instance of requested type and identifier.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SingleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to get
        identifier - the unique identifier of the resource
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return concrete resource instance for given type and identifier, otherwise returns null

      • get

        <T> SingleRequest<T> get(@Nonnull
                       Class<T> resource,
                       @Nonnull
                       String identifier)
        Same as get(Class, Identifier) just identifier is being overloaded.
        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to get
        identifier - the string type identifier of the resource
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return concrete resource instance for given type and identifier, otherwise returns null

      • get

        <T> SingleRequest<T> get(@Nonnull
                       Class<T> resource,
                       @Nonnull
                       Long identifier)
        Same as get(Class, Identifier) just identifier is being overloaded.
        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to get
        identifier - the long type identifier of the resource
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return concrete resource instance for given type and identifier, otherwise returns null

      • list

        <T> RetrievalRequest<T> list(@Nonnull
                           Class<T> resource)
        Find the list of resource instance of given type and filtering criteria.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance RetrievalRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to find
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return list of resource instance matching filtering criteria, otherwise returns empty list

      • list

        <T> RetrievalRequest<T> list(@Nonnull
                           Class<T> resource,
                           @Nullable
                           Identifier parent)
        Find the list of resource instance of given type and filtering criteria.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance RetrievalRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to find
        parent - the unique identifier of the parent resource as an owner of given resource if any
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return list of resource instance matching filtering criteria, otherwise returns empty list

      • insert

        <T> SingleRequest<T> insert(@Nonnull
                          T resource)
        Insert a resource instance.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SingleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance of concrete type to insert
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return newly inserted instance of given resource
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found

      • insert

        <T> SingleRequest<T> insert(@Nonnull
                          T resource,
                          @Nullable
                          Identifier parent)
        Insert a resource instance.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SingleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance of concrete type to insert
        parent - the resource parent identifier
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return newly inserted instance of given resource
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found

      • update

        <T> SingleRequest<T> update(@Nonnull
                          T resource,
                          @Nonnull
                          Identifier identifier)
        Update the given resource instance.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SingleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance of concrete type
        identifier - the unique identifier of resource to update
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return updated instance of given resource
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found

      • patch

        <T> SingleRequest<T> patch(@Nonnull
                         Patch<T> resource,
                         @Nonnull
                         Identifier identifier)
        The partial update to send updated data only for the specific fields to be changed, represented by different (simpler) resource.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SingleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the response
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance that is subset of the origin resource
        identifier - the unique identifier of resource to update
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return response that describes the result of the partial update
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found

      • patch

        <R> PatchRequest<R> patch(@Nonnull
                        Class<R> request)
        The partial update to send updated data only for the specific fields to be changed.
        Parameters:
        request - the concrete class type of the underlying request
        Returns:
        the consequent call will return response that describes the result of the partial update

      • delete

        <T> SingleRequest<T> delete(@Nonnull
                          Class<T> resource,
                          @Nonnull
                          Identifier identifier)
        Remove the resource type for given identifier.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SingleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to remove
        identifier - the unique identifier of resource
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if not matching request URI has found
